item.title: Where to Stream the Live-Action ‘How to Train Your Dragon’ Remake Online
item.description: Starring Mason Thames and Nico Parker, the live-action remake of the book-inspired film is now available to watch at home — here’s when it’s expected to land on Peacock.

item.title: ‘Superman’ Takes Top Spot at Sluggish U.K., Ireland Box Office
item.description: Warner Bros.’ “Superman” debuted atop the U.K. and Ireland box office with £6.9 million ($9.4 million), according to Comscore. The James Gunn-directed reboot, starring David Corenswet and Rachel Brosn
